summary: Veterinary surgery case tracking app with CSV import/export, searchable case cards, defined case fields (including date pickers/defaults), per-case to-do checklist, and blue color scheme.
architectural_notes: Use a React CSV parser library for CSV import/export.

existing_features.title: Implement the case fields exactly as specified: Medical Record #, Arrival Date (defaults to today), Pet Name, Owner Last Name, Species (Canine, Feline, Other), Breed, Sex (Male, Male Neutered, Female, Female Spayed), Date of Birth, Presenting Complaint, Notes.
Support manual entry and a calendar/date-picker UI for all date fields (Arrival Date and Date of Birth).

Add a per-case to-do checklist with exactly seven items and defaults: Discharge Notes (default checked), pDVM Notified (default checked), Labs (default unchecked), Histo (default unchecked), Surgery Report (default unchecked), Imaging (default unchecked), Culture (default unchecked).
Display case data as cards in the main list view, and on each case card show the to-do items that are still not completed (i.e., unchecked).
Implement case search that can filter the case card list using data from all case fields (including text fields, selects, dates, and to-do item names/states).
Add CSV import and CSV export for cases using a React CSV parser, mapping CSV columns to the case fields and to-do checklist items.
Apply a consistent blue color scheme and cohesive visual theme across the app UI (colors, typography, spacing, and card styling), keeping all user-facing text in English.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement CSV import/export for cases using a React CSV parser library
Create case data model and case creation/edit form with specified fields and defaults (e.g., Arrival Date defaults to today)
Support manual entry and calendar/date-picker UI for date fields (Arrival Date, Date of Birth)
Add per-case to-do checklist with 7 items and defaults (Discharge Notes & pDVM Notified checked by default) and show remaining items on case card
Display case data as cards (case card UI)
Add case search across all case fields
Apply blue color scheme/theme across the app UI
Create a persistent veterinary surgery case data model in the Motoko backend and expose CRUD methods to create, list, update, and delete cases.
